00057     ApplicationHandler(EventPtr &event_ptr) : m_event_ptr(event_ptr) {
00058       if (m_event_ptr)
00059         m_urgent = (bool)(m_event_ptr->header.flags & CommHeader::FLAGS_BIT_URGENT);
00060       else
00061         m_urgent = false;
00062     }
00063 
00066     ApplicationHandler(bool urgent=false) : m_urgent(urgent) { }
00067 
00069     virtual ~ApplicationHandler() { return; }
00070 
00074     virtual void run() = 0;
00075 
00079     uint64_t get_thread_group() {
00080       return (m_event_ptr) ?  m_event_ptr->thread_group : 0;
00081     }
00082 
00085     bool is_urgent() { return m_urgent; }
00086 
00087     bool expired() {
00088       if (m_event_ptr && m_event_ptr->type == Event::MESSAGE &&
00089           ReactorRunner::ms_record_arrival_clocks) {
00090         clock_t clock_diff = std::clock() - m_event_ptr->arrival_clocks;
00091         uint32_t wait_ms = clock_diff / (CLOCKS_PER_SEC / 1000);
00092         if (wait_ms >= m_event_ptr->header.timeout_ms) {
00093           if (m_event_ptr->header.flags & CommHeader::FLAGS_BIT_REQUEST)
00094             HT_WARNF("Request expired, wait time %u > timeout %u", wait_ms,
00095                      m_event_ptr->header.timeout_ms);
00096           else
00097             HT_WARNF("Response expired, wait time %u > timeout %u", wait_ms,
00098                      m_event_ptr->header.timeout_ms);
00099           return true;
00100         }
00101       }
00102       return false;
00103     }
00104 
00105   protected:
00106     EventPtr m_event_ptr;
00107     bool m_urgent;
00108   };
